content.rendered:
The Oven Cleaning Company is excited to be Helping Those in Need. Each time you get your Oven or BBQ cleaned you are contributing to The Oven Cleaning Company’s sponsorship of the following Salvation Army Centres that are in need.

Catherine Booth Pre School – Rwanda

Matumaini School of Hope – Tanzania

Kingston School for the Blind – Jamaica

Njoro Special School – Kenya

Petit Place Cazeau – Haiti

For every Oven Cleaning van we have on the road a centre in need is sponsored.

The Salvation Army is a global organisation currently serving in 127 countries around the world. Every year The Salvation Army provides healthcare, learning, activity and love to thousands of disabled, abandoned and impoverished children in the developing world. The lives of more than a billion people can be changed by those who have more than enough to share. Supporting an overseas centre means that the Salvation Army are assisted to transform lives and provide dignity through education, sustainable farming opportunities, water sanitation, health projects and rehabilitation for the victims of human trafficking.

If you would like to find out about other ways you can help with sponsorship please go to www.salvationarmy.org.au/childsponsorship .
